---
id: cc-real-time-get-group-metrics-by-id
title: "Individual Group Statistics"
description: "This method retrieves real-time metrics for a specific group. The response returns an object which contains the group ID, group name and a list of metric objects. The metric contains a key field with a label or description as well as a value field."

hide_title: true

api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Individual Group Statistics"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/groups/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method retrieves real-time metrics for a specific group. The response returns an object which contains the group ID, group name and a list of metric objects. The metric contains a key field with a label or description as well as a value field.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"metrics","in":"query","description":"The set of metric identifiers to be returned.","required":false,"explode":true,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"example":["availableIdle.rt","eligible.rt","enabled.rt","handling.rt","onBreak.rt","workingOffline.rt","wrapUp.rt"]},{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"timezone","in":"query","description":"The specified timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only).","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Europe/Helsinki"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Success/OK","content":{"application/xml":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"123"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Agent Group 1"},"metrics":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","title":"MetricItem","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","example":"abandoned.int-15m"},"value":{"type":"number","example":5}}}}},"title":"SingleGroupResponseXML","xml":{"name":"MetricsResponse","attribute":true}}},"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"123"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Agent Group 1"},"metrics":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","title":"MetricItem","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","example":"abandoned.int-15m"},"value":{"type":"number","example":5}}}}},"title":"SingleGroupResponse","xml":{"name":"item","attribute":true}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
